S.FORM: == lalidec == 九芎 u siwkay nu lalidec mauzip i caykatakalaway a takalaw nu bayu'. pudac nu kilang lameneng. u sanek sa akenek. anu mabanic sa, kapah mukan tu lalidec a sapayu'. tabaki ku lalidec, takalaw sa 10m. papah sa 2-5cm tanaya', 1-2cm ahebal. hali cilal tina kilang. sicilal sa kapah ku uzip. cayka namuh mukayakay ku ungay tu tina kilang, lameneng ku pudac. u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu u sulit nu Hulam 九芎(Lagerstroemia subcostata) . u sulit nu Lipun シマサルスベリとはミソハギ科の植物の一種.学名Lagerstroemia subcostata.沖縄で" 20m . u sulit nu Amilika Lagerstroemia subcostata is a deciduous tree which is native to Japan, Taiwan, China and the Philippines.

== lalidec == 九芎 o siwkay no lalidec maozip i caykatakalaway a takalaw no bayo'. podac no kilang lameneng. o sanek sa akenek. ano mabanic sa, kapah mokan to lalidec a sapayo'. tabaki ko lalidec, takalaw sa 10m. papah sa 2-5cm tanaya', 1-2cm ahebal. hali cilal tina kilang. sicilal sa kapah ko ozip. cayka namoh mokayakay ko ongay to tina kilang, lameneng ko podac. o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo o solit no Holam 九芎(Lagerstroemia sobcostata) . o solit no Lipon シマサルスベリとはミソハギ科の植物の一種.学名Lagerstroemia sobcostata.沖縄で" 20m . o solit no Amilika Lagerstroemia sobcostata is a decidooos tree which is native to Japan, Taiwan, China and the Philippines.
